name: Outnumber
description:
You have been blessed ! You can Fight (not so) dangerous enemies without being afraid to DIE: Your army of Ghosts will grow and they will become your most valuable allies...

Discover Scrolls to unlock your true potential and level up to increase your characteristics.

CONTROLS:
Keyboard (WASD + IOKL) or Gamepad with joystick recommended.

I   : Open Characteristics
O : Cast Spell (must be unlocked)
K  : Dash (must be unlocked)
L  : Attack

When characteristics are opened, use O/K/L to improve your characteristics, and then don't forget to close characteristics with I !

Unlock Dash to jump between platforms.

Unlock Spell to invoke magical globes.

Game made for the Retro 8-bit Game Jam 2020. All assets were made by myself during the jam.
With a resolution of 320x280, It is composed of around 137 sprites (32x32px), with this 16 colours palette:

If you want to download the assets created for this jam, feel free to do it here. Here is a free gif of a Big Rabbish explosion that I sadly didn't have time to implement

This is my third game. If you feel adventurous, you can check my bouldering game on draelent.itch.io or check my soundcloud.
